sn7.9:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati sundarikaya nadiya tire.
sn7.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabharadvajo brahmano sundarikaya nadiya tire aggim juhati, aggihuttam paricarati.
sn7.9:1.3: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano aggim juhitva aggihuttam paricaritva utthayasana samanta catuddisa anuvilokesi:
sn7.9:1.5: Addasa kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam annatarasmim rukkhamule sasisam parutam nisinnam.
sn7.9:1.6: Disvana vamena hatthena habyasesam gahetva dakkhinena hatthena kamandalum gahetva yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn7.9:1.7: Atha kho bhagava sundarikabharadvajassa brahmanassa padasaddena sisam vivari.
sn7.9:1.8: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano “mundo ayam bhavam, mundako ayam bhavan”ti tatova puna nivattitukamo ahosi.
sn7.9:2.1: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.9:9.1: “Atha kassa caham, bho gotama, imam habyasesam dammi”ti?
sn7.9:9.2: “Na khvaham, brahmana, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya yasseso habyaseso bhutto samma parinamam gaccheyya annatra, brahmana, tathagatassa va tathagatasavakassa va.
sn7.9:9.3: Tena hi tvam, brahmana, tam habyasesam appaharite va chaddehi appanake va udake opilapehi”ti.
sn7.9:10.1: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano tam habyasesam appanake udake opilapesi.
sn7.9:10.2: Atha kho so habyaseso udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati.
sn7.9:10.3: Seyyathapi nama phalo divasamsantatto udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati;
sn7.9:10.4: evameva so habyaseso udake pakkhitto ciccitayati citicitayati sandhupayati sampadhupayati.
sn7.9:11.1: Atha kho sundarikabharadvajo brahmano samviggo lomahatthajato yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi.
sn7.9:11.2: Ekamantam thitam kho sundarikabharadvajam brahmanam bhagava gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn7.9:12.3: Na hi tena suddhim kusala vadanti,
sn7.9:17.1: Evam vutte, sundarikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.9:17.3: annataro ca panayasma bharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
